ant.aBody:
Ego plantavi
Apollo rigavit Apollo rigavi deus autem incrementum dedit alleluia

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S

verses.vBody: Unusquisque propriam mercedem accipiet Unusquisque enim propriam mercedem accipiet secundum suum laborem
